scripts.start: yarn stop && mkdir -p logs && npx pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only world
scripts.watch: yarn stop && mkdir -p logs && npx pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only world-watch
scripts.debug: yarn stop && yarn workspace @orbital/core build && yarn workspace @orbital/microservices build && yarn workspace @orbital/typegoose build && yarn workspace @scout/core build && rm -rf dist && nest build --preserveWatchOutput && mkdir -p logs && npx pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only world-debug
scripts.stop: npx pm2 stop world-watch 2>/dev/null || true && npx pm2 stop world-debug 2>/dev/null || true && npx pm2 stop world 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.restart: npx pm2 restart world-watch 2>/dev/null || true && npx pm2 restart world-debug 2>/dev/null || true && npx pm2 restart world 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.logs: node -e "process.argv.includes('watch') ? require('child_process').execSync('npx pm2 logs', {stdio: 'inherit'}) : require('child_process').execSync('npx pm2 logs --lines 200 --nostream', {stdio: 'inherit'})"
scripts.delete: npx pm2 delete world-watch 2>/dev/null || true && npx pm2 delete world-debug 2>/dev/null || true && npx pm2 delete world 2>/dev/null || true
